議論の余地: (ぎろんのよち) - room for argument
議論の末に: (ぎろんのすえに) - after a heated discussion
議論を戦わす: (ぎろんをたたかわす) - to have a discussion
議論沸騰: (ぎろんふっとう) - (yoji) discussion (argument) becoming heated; debate being in a ferment
議論百出: (ぎろんひゃくしゅつ) - (yoji) diverse arguments arising in great numbers
議連: (ぎれん) - Diet members' caucus; caucus of the Diet
議運: (ぎうん) - Committee on Rules and Administration (Diet); House Steering Committee; Standing Committee for House Management
議運委: (ぎうんい) - Committee on Rules and Administration (Diet)
議長: (ぎちょう) - chairman; speaker (e.g. of assembly); president (e.g. of council, senate, etc.); moderator (e.g. of a newsgroup)
議長を務める: (ぎちょうをつとめる) - to act as chairman
議長国: (ぎちょうこく) - host country (e.g. for a meeting); chair country
議長職権: (ぎちょうしょっけん) - authority as chairperson or president, etc.
議院内閣制: (ぎいんないかくせい) - parliamentary system of government
議院運営委員会: (ぎいんうんえいいいんかい) - Committee on Rules and Administration (Diet); House Steering Committee; Standing Committee for House Management
議院運営委員長: (ぎいんうんえいいいんちょう) - House Steering Committee Chairman
議題に上す: (ぎだいにのぼす) - to bring up for discussion
譲りうける: (ゆずりうける) - to inherit; to receive; to take over by transfer
譲りわたす: (ゆずりわたす) - to hand over; to turn over; to cede
譲り受ける: (ゆずりうける) - to inherit; to receive; to take over by transfer
譲り受け人: (ゆずりうけにん) - assignee; grantee; transferee
譲り合う: (ゆずりあう) - to give and take; to make mutual concessions; to compromise
譲り渡す: (ゆずりわたす) - to hand over; to turn over; to cede
譲り状: (ゆずりじょう) - deed of transfer
譲る: (yuzuru) - to hand over, to transfer, to turn over, to assign, to convey, to bequeath; to give up (ex.: o assento de alguém), to give way , to hand over, to transfer, to turn over, to assign, to convey, to bequeath; to give up (e.g. one's seat), to give way; to yield, to concede, to give ground, to surrender; to sell
譲受人: (じょうじゅにん) - assignee; grantee; transferee
譲渡不能: (じょうとふのう) - {law} non-transferable; non-assignable; unassignable; non-negotiable
譲渡人: (ゆずりわたしにん) - transferor; assignor
譲渡価格: (じょうとかかく) - transfer price; transfer cost
譲渡可能: (じょうとかのう) - {law} transferable; alienable; assignable
譲渡可能定期預金証書: (じょうとかのうていきよきんしょうしょ) - negotiable certificate of deposit
譲渡性預金: (じょうとせいよきん) - negotiable deposit
譲渡所得: (じょうとしょとく) - capital gains
譲葉: (ユズリハ) - false daphne (Daphniphyllum macropodum); yuzuriha
譲許の保障: (じょうきょのほしょう) - security of (tariff) concessions
譲許表: (じょうきょひょう) - schedule of (tariff) concessions
譴責: (けんせき) - reprimand; rebuke; censure; reproof
護る: (まもる) - to protect/to guard/to defend; to keep (i.e. a promise)/to abide (by the rules)/to observe/to obey/to follow
護国: (ごこく) - defense of one's country; defence of one's country
護国神社: (ごこくじんじゃ) - shrine honoring war dead; shrine honouring war dead
護岸工事: (ごがんこうじ) - levee protection works
護憲派: (ごけんは) - advocates of protection of the Constitution; supporter of the current Constitution
護憲運動: (ごけんうんどう) - movement to defend the Constitution
護持: (ごじ) - defend and maintain; support; protection
護摩: (ごま) - homa; Buddhist rite of burning cedar sticks before an idol to ask for blessings
護摩の灰: (ごまのはい) - thief posing as fellow traveller (traveler)
護摩木: (ごまぎ) - homa stick; stick on which prayers are written, then ritually burnt before an idol to ask for blessings
護法: (ごほう) - defence of Buddhist doctrines/god who defends Buddhist doctrines; defence of the constitution; religious power to dispel demons and diseases
護法善神: (ごほうぜんじん) - benevolent deities who protect the dharma
護衛を付ける: (ごえいをつける) - to provide (a person) with a bodyguard
護衛兵: (ごえいへい) - body guard; military escort
護衛艦: (ごえいかん) - escort vessel; destroyer (Japan Maritime Self-Defense Force)
護衛駆逐艦: (ごえいくちくかん) - destroyer escort
護身の術: (ごしんのじゅつ) - art of self-defense; art of self-defence
護身刀: (ごしんとう) - sword used for self-defense
護身術: (ごしんじゅつ) - art of self-defense; art of self-defence
護送車: (ごそうしゃ) - police van; paddy wagon; prisoner transport vehicle
讃える: (たたえる) - to extol; to give praise
讃する: (さんする) - to approve/to agree/to assent/to endorse/to support/to back; to inscribe; to praise/to laud
讃岐うどん: (さぬきうどん) - Sanuki udon; thick udon from Kagawa pref.
讃岐式アクセント: (さぬきしきアクセント) - Sanuki accent, used in northern Shikoku
讃岐饂飩: (さぬきうどん) - Sanuki udon; thick udon from Kagawa pref.
讃歌: (さんか) - song of praise; eulogy; paean; hymn
讃談: (さんだん) - praising Buddha/sermon; praise (second of the five gates of mindfulness); style of Buddhistic song of praise, usually praising Buddha, the Bodhisattva, the Buddhistic teachings, etc.; rumor/rumour/hearsay
讒口: (ざんこう) - false charge; slander; defamation
